displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians whose eyes are on the stars.

Contains Season 3 shaders, Bright Engrams, and 500 Bright Dust.
displayProperties.name: Discovery Bundle

displayProperties.description: Lull your enemies to sleep as they burn to a crisp—and do it in style, with this stunning weapon ornament for Sleeper Simulant.
displayProperties.name: Sleeper's Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who want to survive the ice caps of Mars.

Contains the Azure Azazyel Sparrow, a transmat effect, and 10 shaders.
displayProperties.name: Deep Freeze Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who want to evoke the heights of the Golden Age.

Contains a Legendary jumpship, a Legendary Sparrow, a Legendary Ghost Shell, and 10 Clovis Bray shaders.
displayProperties.name: BrayTech Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who've bonded with a returning legend.

Contains a weapon ornament for Polaris Lance, 3 Gleaming Boons of the Vanguard, and 3 Fireteam Medallions.
displayProperties.name: Destructive Research Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who embrace the new way of things.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams and 1 Gleaming Boon of the Vanguard.
displayProperties.name: Boons of Bray Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who remember the Iron Lords.

Contains an Iron Lord emote, 1 Gleaming Boon of the Crucible, and 1 Fireteam Medallion.
displayProperties.name: Iron Emote Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who live for the Iron Banner.

Contains a weapon ornament for Fighting Lion, 2 Gleaming Boons of the Crucible, and 1 Fireteam Medallion.
displayProperties.name: Iron Ornament Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians whose future is among the stars.

Contains a Dead Orbit emote, 5 Dead Orbit Resurrection shaders, and 1 Fireteam Medallion.
displayProperties.name: Inevitable Exodus Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians whose future is perpetual conflict.

Contains a Future War Cult emote, 5 War Cult Endgame shaders, and 1 Fireteam Medallion.
displayProperties.name: War in All Times Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians whose future is inextricably tied to Earth.

Contains a New Monarchy emote, 5 New Monarchy Succession shaders, and 1 Fireteam Medallion.
displayProperties.name: Sovereign's Grace Bundle

displayProperties.description: Jump not from the pan into the flames.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Strides (Scorched)

displayProperties.description: Lift your arms high to welcome the power of the sun.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Grasps (Rekindled)

displayProperties.description: Let the feeling of reunion be in your heart.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Vest (Rekindled)

displayProperties.description: Surround yourself with mistakes corrected.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Cloak (Rekindled)

displayProperties.description: Be renewed in mind and spirit.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Mask (Rekindled)

displayProperties.description: Go in health and new vigor.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Strides (Rekindled)

displayProperties.description:
This item applies a blue glow to all Solstice head armor. Once you unlock it, it's available for all three classes.

This elemental armor glow shines brightest when your subclass element matches.
displayProperties.name: Arcing Helmet Glow

displayProperties.name: No Armor Glow

displayProperties.description: Sometimes the battle burns you up.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Gauntlets (Scorched)

displayProperties.description: Memories of the City burn in your heart.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Plate (Scorched)

displayProperties.description: Battle scars may burn and leave a mark.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Mark (Scorched)

displayProperties.description: Stare into the sun and get burned.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Helm (Scorched)

displayProperties.description: Go swift as a steed newly awakened.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Greaves (Scorched)

displayProperties.description: Lift and rise with renewed strength.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Gauntlets (Rekindled)

displayProperties.description: Let the spirit swell in your heart.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Plate (Rekindled)

displayProperties.description: Wear the aspect of surging renewal.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Mark (Rekindled)

displayProperties.description: Hold your head high again.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Helm (Rekindled)

displayProperties.description: Rally and run with renewed vigor.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Greaves (Rekindled)

displayProperties.description: Heat can burn as much as it warms.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Gloves (Scorched)

displayProperties.description: Even the warmest light can sometimes burn you up.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Robes (Scorched)

displayProperties.description: The brightest lights sometimes burn out fastest.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Bond (Scorched)

displayProperties.description: Beloved cities burn in your mind's eye.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Hood (Scorched)

displayProperties.description: Courage sometimes requires standing still.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Boots (Scorched)

displayProperties.description: Renewal can begin with just a spark.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Gloves (Rekindled)
